name: WinWar: WarCraft for Windows

screenshots.caption: Orc Level 1 running under Linux (now with units and buildings)
Main menu running in WinRT simulator
Game screen of Orc Level 1 running in WinRT simulator

short_description:
(Please refer to the Wiki for updated information.)

WinWar is a Windows port of the original WarCraft: Orcs & Humans PC Game. It is completely rewritten from scratch using only the original art and level data.

It REQUIRES the original game; no game data is included. Since version 0.2.0 WinWar is compatible with the demo version, which you can find here:
http://wowpedia.org/Warcraft:_Orcs_%26_Humans_%28Demo%29

See [Compiling and Running] in the Wiki for basic instructions.

The current code is intended to work on the following platforms:
 - Windows Desktop
 - Windows Store (WindowsRT)
 - Linux
 - OSX
